Title: The Lego Movie
Overview: An ordinary Lego mini-figure, mistakenly thought to be the extraordinary MasterBuilder, is recruited to join a quest to stop an evil Lego tyrant from conquering the universe.
Tagline: The story of a nobody who saved everybody.
Keywords: father son relationship, creativity, friendship, part live action, toys, based on toy, falling in love, super powers, duringcreditsstinger, different worlds, lego, batman
production_companies: Village Roadshow Pictures, DC Comics, Vertigo Entertainment, Lin Pictures, Warner Bros. Animation, LEGO, Warner Bros., Animal Logic, Warner Animation Group, RatPac-Dune Entertainment
Cast: Chris Pratt, Will Ferrell, Elizabeth Banks
